trans-unit.source: Encapsulates information about an HTTP request that matches a defined route.
The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> class contains information about the HTTP request in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.HttpContext%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> classe contiene informazioni sulla richiesta HTTP nel <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.HttpContext%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: It contains information about the route that matched the current request in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni sulla route corrispondente alla richiesta corrente nella <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you construct a URL from a route, you pass an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> class to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si costruisce un URL da una route, si passa un'istanza del <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> classe per il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> class.
An object that contains information about the HTTP request.
An object that contains information about the route that matched the current request.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext" /> class.
Gets information about the HTTP request.
An object that contains information about the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene le informazioni sulla richiesta HTTP.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.HttpContext%2A> property, you must pass the value as a parameter when you call the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.%23ctor%28System.Web.HttpContextBase%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteData%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.HttpContext%2A> proprietà, è necessario passare il valore come parametro quando si chiama il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.%23ctor%28System.Web.HttpContextBase%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteData%29> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the requested route.
An object that contains information about the requested route.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene le informazioni sulla route richiesta.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A> property, you must pass the value as a parameter when you call the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.%23ctor%28System.Web.HttpContextBase%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteData%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A> proprietà, è necessario passare il valore come parametro quando si chiama il <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.%23ctor%28System.Web.HttpContextBase%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteData%29> costruttore.
